Eternal optimism: the
Liz Abinante
story.

- @fivetanley



I am a very enthusiastic web developer living in Chicago. I am a co-leader for Girl Develop It Chicago and an engineer at Instructure. I speak, teach, and write about web development, diversity, education, accessibility, and popular culture. I will do just about anything for a good taco.
